verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after they were come out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H5375><s%> ye <S%H853><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> with the number <S%H4557><s%> of their names, <S%H8034><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> by their polls; <S%H1538><s%>

From twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that are able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%> in Israel: <S%H3478><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall number <S%H6485><s%> them by their armies. <S%H6635><s%>

And with <S%H854><s%> you there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of every <S%H376><s%> tribe; <S%H4294><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of his fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you: of the tribe of Reuben; <S%H7205><s%> Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur. <S%H7707><s%>
Of Simeon; <S%H8095><s%> Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai. <S%H6701><s%>
Of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab. <S%H5992><s%>
Of Issachar; <S%H3485><s%> Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar. <S%H6686><s%>
Of Zebulun; <S%H2074><s%> Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon. <S%H2497><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph: <S%H3130><s%> of Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud: <S%H5989><s%> of Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> Gamaliel <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur. <S%H6301><s%>
Of Benjamin; <S%H1144><s%> Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gideoni. <S%H1441><s%>
Of Dan; <S%H1835><s%> Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai. <S%H5996><s%>
Of Asher; <S%H836><s%> Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ocran. <S%H5918><s%>
Of Gad; <S%H1410><s%> Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Deuel. <S%H1845><s%>
Of Naphtali; <S%H5321><s%> Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan. <S%H5881><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were the renowned <S%H7121><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are expressed <S%H5344><s%> by their names: <S%H8034><s%>

And they assembled <S%H6950><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> together on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> and they declared their pedigrees <S%H3205><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> by their polls. <S%H1538><s%>
As <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so he numbered <S%H6485><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Israel's <S%H3478><s%> eldest son, <S%H1060><s%> by their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> by their polls, <S%H1538><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> were forty <S%H705><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> by their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> by their polls, <S%H1538><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> by their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> were forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty. <S%H2572><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> by their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> were threescore and fourteen <S%H7657><s%> <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> by their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> by their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> namely, of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> by their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>
Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> were forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> by their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> by their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> by their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> were threescore <S%H8346><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> by their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> were forty <S%H705><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> throughout their generations, <S%H8435><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

Those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, even of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are those that were numbered, <S%H6485><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered, <S%H6485><s%> and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> being twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men: <S%H376><s%> each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H259><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of his fathers. <S%H1><s%>

So were <S%H1961><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%> in Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

Even all <S%H3605><s%> they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty. <S%H2572><s%>
But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> after the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> were not <S%H3808><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.
For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> number <S%H6485><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of them among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

But thou <S%H859><s%> shalt appoint <S%H6485><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of testimony, <S%H5715><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, and over <S%H5921><s%> all things <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> belong to it: they <S%H1992><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof; and they <S%H1992><s%> shall minister <S%H8334><s%> unto it, and shall encamp <S%H2583><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And when the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> setteth forward, <S%H5265><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall take it down: <S%H3381><s%> <S%H853><s%> and when the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> is to be pitched, <S%H2583><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall set it up: <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> and the stranger <S%H2114><s%> that cometh nigh <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall pitch their tents, <S%H2583><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> his own camp, <S%H4264><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> his own standard, <S%H1714><s%> throughout their hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall pitch <S%H2583><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of testimony, <S%H5715><s%> that there be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of testimony. <S%H5715><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> they.
